#summary enabling extended api logging

Set the log level setting to “Detail” and then replicate the problem again:

 # In TWS,
 #        Navigate to Configure menu then API, select “All API Setting…”
 #          Logging Level set to “Detail”
 #        Replicate the problem again and send the log file to us
 #        The log file is located within C:\JTS directory and it is named log.day.txt.
